noMachines: No machines have been configured yet.
noMachinesAddMachine: Add Your first machine by clicking the 'Add Machine' button.
noVisibleMachines: All machines are currently hidden due to your visibility settings.
noMachinesEditMachines: Change your visibility settings or enable a machine to view it here.
pollIntervalTitle: How often the machine will be polled for updates
localPortTitle: The local port where the Overseer web app will be hosted.
aiMonitoringFrameCaptureRateHelp: Capturing more frames increases accuracy but also increases resource usage.
name: Name
profileTitle: The profile that will be used when interacting with Octoprint.
repRapFirmwarePasswordPlaceholder: Leave empty if password is not enabled.
requiresAdminPrompt: At least one administrator user must always exist and no other administrators are currently configured.
sessionLifetimeTitle: Specifies how long the user will remain logged into the application before needing to re-authenticate. Leave blank to remain logged in indefinitely.
userSignedOut: This user has been signed out and will be required to sign in again to continue using the application.
isLoggedInTitle: Specifies if a user has a active login
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to complete this action?
deleteMachinePrompt: Are you sure you want to remove this machine?
deleteUserPrompt: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
deleteLastUserPrompt: At least one user must exist when 'Require User Logins' is enabled. To remove this user disable 'Require User Logins' or add another user.
certificateWarning: Overseer was unable to connect to the requested machine because the certificate is considered insecure or invalid.
certificateCaution: To complete this action a security exception for this certificate must be created. Do you wish to continue?
clientPemTitle: Providing a certificate allows Overseer to connect to machines accessible through a reverse proxy configured to use Client Certificate Authentication.
clientPemPlaceholder: Paste Contents of the .PEM client certificate
cancelJobMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this job?
dataLoss: Performing this action will discard invalid form data. Would you like to continue?
preauthenticationDescriptionReadonly: Use this magic link to grant read-only access to Overseer in scenarios where typical user input is unavailable, such as from a kiosk or during live-streaming, or to provide temporary access without providing a password.
preauthenticationDescriptionUser: Share this magic link with a user to allow them to gain access to their account. They'll be prompted to set a new password after signing in.
preauthenticationLinkExpires: The generated link is single-use and remains active for 2 minutes. Once used, the session will remain active according to this user's configured session duration.
forcedPasswordChange: You must update your password before continuing.
attribution: Illustration by Andrei Yushchenko from the Noun Project.
author: Author
machineDangerZoneDescription: Manage monitoring state or permanently remove this machine.
userDangerZoneDescription: Manage session status or permanently remove this user account.
newUserPermissionMessage: You will be able to give this user a magic link to set their password after the user has been created.

about.title: Overseer is a utility that allows you to monitor multiple automated machines, such as 3D Printers, from a single web interface.
about.helpDescription: Troubleshoot or report issues with your Overseer installation.
about.openSourceNotice: Overseer is open source software released under the
about.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

errors.octoprint_invalid_key: Octoprint refused the connection because the provided API Key is invalid
errors.machine_connect_failure: Failed to establish a connection with the machine
errors.delete_user_unavailable: This user can't be deleted because at least one user must exist
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action

setup.message: Before you begin let's setup Overseer!
setup.createMachineMessage: Please add at least one machine...
setup.completeMessage: The initial setup for Overseer is now complete, what would you like to do next?
setup.existingMachinesMessage: Existing machine found! Would you like to skip this step?

jobNotifications.JobErrorMessage: An error occurred during job #{{jobNumber}} on {{machineName}}.
jobNotifications.JobFailureMessage: AI monitoring detected a potential failure during job #{{jobNumber}} on {{machineName}}.

updates.manualUpdateRequired: Auto-update is not available on this platform. Please update manually by downloading the latest release.
updates.upToDate: You are running the latest version.
updates.installSuccess: Update installed successfully. The application will restart.

restart.title: Restart Required
restart.complete: Restart complete! The application is ready.
restart.failed: Failed to restart the application. Please restart manually.
restart.manualRequired: A restart is required to apply changes. Please restart the application to complete the process.
